channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report X-2024021788
item.description:
Report X-2024021788

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-22
  • City: GREENVILLE
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED WET, SITTING ON A PLASTIC SHEET IN THE UNLOAD UNDERNEATH THE ROLLERS. PACKAGE WAS THEN IMMEDIATELY PLACED INTO A LINED HAZARDOUS MATERIALS RED TOTE. DescribePack: FAILURE WITH BOTH GALLON BOTTLES, LEAKING FROM THE CAPS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS PLACED ONTO A PLASTIC SHEET IN THE UNLOAD UNTIL IT WAS DISCOVERED BY MANAGEMENT WHO THEN PLACED IT INTO A RED HAZARDOUS MATERIALS TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2024021760
item.description:
Report X-2024021760

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-22
  • City: LEXINGTON
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered damaged in a trailer by a package handler. Admin on duty was alerted and placed the damaged hazmat into a lined hazmat bin. The bin was then relocated to the hazmat cage and was place in the locked cage for further processing. DescribePack: The lid on the bucket was loose. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat package was place in a lined hazmat bin and placed in a locked hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2024021793
item.description:
Report X-2024021793

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-23
  • City: LEXINGTON
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler found damaged HAZMAT in trailer. Notified OPS Manager. OPS Manager notified QA. HAZMAT placed in plastic liner in HAZMAT bin. Bin was taken to HAZMAT cage for further processing. DescribePack: There were 2 2.5 gallons buckets, and one bucket had a loose top. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in lined bin in HAZMAT cage.

item.title: Report X-2024021287
item.description:
Report X-2024021287

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-01T18:14:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-10
  • City: WEST COLUMBIA
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO UNLOAD 1 DOOR 26 FOR A LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE. RESPONDER RESPONDED TO PACKAGE USING THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS. RESPONDER CONTAINERIZED PACKAGE AND CLEANED UP MATERIALS IN A SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
